scripts.lint: npx eslint --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern api/; npx eslint --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern app/; npx eslint --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern components/; npx eslint --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern context/; npx eslint --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern utils/
scripts.lint:fix: npx eslint --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern api/ --fix && npx eslint --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern app/ --fix && npx eslint --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern components/ && npx eslint --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern context/ && --fix && npx eslint --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern utils/ --fix
scripts.prettier:check: npx prettier --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --check api/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json}; npx prettier --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --check app/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json}; npx prettier --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --check components/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json}; npx prettier --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --check context/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json}; npx prettier --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --check utils/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json}
scripts.prettier:write: npx prettier --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --write api/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json} && npx prettier --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --write app/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json} && npx prettier --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --write components/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json} && npx prettier --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --write context/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json} && npx prettier --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --write utils/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json}
scripts.cs: npm run lint; npm run prettier
scripts.cs:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run prettier:write
